eg.document

Class TypingEdit

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.document.TypingEdit

  • public class TypingEdit
extends java.lang.Object
    Mediates between the editing of the text document and the actions that happen in response.

    Created in FileDocument

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TypingEdit(TextDocument textDoc, LineNumberDocument lineNrDoc)

      • colorMultipleLines

        public void colorMultipleLines(java.lang.String section,
                               int pos)
        Colors the specified section of the document text. If this section does not encompass full lines, its first and last lines are completed for coloring. If it is only a part of a single line this line is as well completed.
        Parameters:
        section - a section of the document text. If null the entire text is used.
        pos - the pos where section starts

      • readEditingState
